import React, {Component} from 'react' class CurrentlyReading extends Component{ state = { currentlyReading:[] } render(){ const {books} = this.props this.state.currentlyReading= books.filter((book)=>(book.shelf.toLowerCase()==="currentlyreading")) return (
{console.log(this.state.currentlyReading)}

Currently Reading

  1. To Kill a Mockingbird
    Harper Lee
  2. Ender's Game
    Orson Scott Card
) } } export default CurrentlyReading
